awards.en: World Whiskey Awards Bronze 2025, ISC Silver 2024, CWSA Gold 2024

description.en: Singapore's first whiskey, crafted from fragrant Thai Hom Mali rice. A true grain-to-bottle expression of Southeast Asian innovation.

description.en: Singapore's pioneering single malt whisky, matured in tropical conditions for unique character.

description.en: Full-strength expression showcasing the intensity of tropical aging. Bold and uncompromising.
description.zh: Full-strength expression showcasing the intensity of tropical aging. Bold and uncompromising.
